mapper.select: SELECT room_id AS groupId, pension_id AS pensionId, name AS groupName FROM room, ( SELECT father_id, count(*) FROM room WHERE pension_id = #{pensionId} AND father_id != 0 AND room_status = 0 GROUP BY father_id ) sub WHERE room.room_id = sub.father_id AND room.room_status = 0;

SELECT r.room_id AS roomId, pension_id AS pensionId, father_id AS groupId, sub.name AS groupName, r.name AS roomName, price AS price, room_status AS roomStatus FROM room r, ( SELECT room_id, name FROM room ) sub WHERE r.room_id = #{roomId} AND r.father_id = sub.room_id;
SELECT room_id AS groupId, pension_id AS pensionId, name AS groupName FROM room WHERE room_id = #{groupId}
SELECT r.* FROM room r LEFT JOIN pension p ON r.pension_id = p.pension_id WHERE p.merchant_id = #{merchantId} AND r.father_id != 0;
